title: Day 3
message:
**Functions and Loops**

javascript uses alot of functions to do replicable tasks. 

DRY  -- DONT REPEAT YOURSELF

arrays -- hold values in zero-indexed lists
							uses square brackets \[\]
							accessing the array by brackets
objects -- hold values in key/value pairs.
							uses curly braces \{\}
							accessing the object by bracket and          dot
